settingsStrictBlockingInfo.message:
Strict blocking, introduced in version 0.3.6, means that even if you whitelist a specific hostname, blacklisted type of requests (plugins, frames, etc.) will remain blacklisted. For some users this maybe too bothersome, hence this switch.

Strict blocking on: blacklisted types of request (if any) for a whitelisted hostname are blocked (unless you explicitly whitelist specifically these types of request for the whitelisted hostname.)

Strict blocking off: blacklisted types of request (if any) for a whitelisted hostname are allowed (unless you explicitly blacklist specifically these types of request for the whitelisted hostname.)
